nodes.text: "The Wookiees Are Back!" is a short documentary featurette included among the special features of the DVD release of Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. The film follows the creation of the Wookiee costumes used in the films as well as the filming of scenes featuring the Wookiees. Peter Mayhew and Chewbacca appear, along with other Wookiees and the actors who played them.
